review_data.title: Great food.
review_data.content: We followed the reviews to this place with high hopes, and we're not disappointed. A great mix of street food, teas and hot pot. All the food was good. I forgot to take any photos as I was hungry and then there was none left....More

review_data.title: Best evening and food ever
review_data.content: I had the pleasure of visiting Simon Say’s and it was such a great experience. The food is absolutely delicious and it is very clear that a lot of attention and effort is going into making the food. I have never had Taiwanese food before,...More

review_data.title: Gutes Essen, aber das Drumherum stimmt überhaupt nicht
review_data.content: Unser Tisch war klebrig, auf den Papier-Tischset hatte es Flecken und Ringe (wurde wohl nicht gewechselt). Die Teller und Essstäbchen...More

review_data.title: Geheimtipp
review_data.content: Gutes Essen, interessante Auswahl, nett eingerichtetes. Lokal und sehr freundlicher Service. Moderate Preise für Zürich. Kommen gerne wieder.

review_data.title: Authentic Chinese New Year menu in CH!
review_data.content: After living 21 years in Switzerland as Taiwanese, CNY tradition has been neglected from time to time. Yesterday I was with a butch of girlfriends at Simon Says to celebrate Chinese New Year, and we all are very pleased with those wonderful dishes as if...More

review_data.title: Great quality food in a cozy ambience
review_data.content: We tried all the vegetarian appetizers which were really tasty, and the dumplings were my fav. We had beef mains - black bean sauce & a spicy one that were great quality beef, and super tasty. Loved the looks of the place & the staff...More

review_data.title: Best Asian food in Zurich, maybe even Switzerland
review_data.content: Best Asian food I have had in Europe. Great service and very nice and relaxed venue. Highly recommend 👍 Thanks for a great dinner.

review_data.title: Best asian food in Zürich maybe Switzerland
review_data.content: The bubble tea is fantastic and the popcorn chicken is great (way better than KFC) the sweet and sour chicken is very enjoyable and the staff is very nice i suggest it to anyone who likes asian food and bubble tea if you go you...More

review_data.title: Best Asian Dining In Zurich
review_data.content: Such a nice atmosphere - and the food is amazing. We came with three kids and the staff was very kind. The kids loved the popcorn chicken appetizer and the bubble tea drinks, and the adults appreciated the craft beer selection. The hot pot was...More

review_data.title: Ein MUSS! um gute Taiwanesische Küche zu geniessen.
review_data.content: Ein sehr gemütliches Restaurant. Man fühlte sich wie bei guten Freunden zu Hause. Das essen war Himmlisch und die Bedienung...More

review_data.title: Simon has done it again!
review_data.content: Simon has done it again, but this time it’s his place! For me Simon is one of the best hosts in Zurich and the food gives you a great impression on the flavors of Taiwan. My new favorite Asian restaurant in town. Remko says you...More
